msbt.message: Yo! ! We were waiting for you!We need you now! Just follow me!
Yo! ! We were waiting for you!Don't ask questions, just be quiet and follow me, !
Heyaaa, ! There you are!I've got somewhere to take you! Follow me, !
HAPPY BIRTHDAAAAAY!

Surprised? Yeah, you look surprised!We all wanted to celebrate your birthday together! So we prepared for it in secret!I know you've been doing your deep lung training just like I told ya. Now it's show time, !Flex those lung muscles! Stand in front of the cake and blow the candles out all at once with !

Surprised?We thought we'd all celebrate your birthday together, so we prepped for it in secret!OK, it isn't a leap year this year, but we're celebrating a day early!I know you've been doing your deep lung training, just like I told ya, so it's show time, !Flex those lung muscles! Stand in front of the cake and blow the candles out all at once with !

Heh heh, surprised?We thought we'd all celebrate your birthday together! So we prepared for it in secret!AND it's a leap year this year! This day only happens once every four years! That's REALLY special!I know you've been doing your deep lung training, just like I told ya. Now it's show time, !Flex those lung muscles! Stand in front of the cake and blow the candles out all at once with !
Hey! Where are you going? This cake's got your name on it!
Wait a second, ! You haven't even blown the candles out yet!
Huh? Something urgent going on? You're already here, so at least blow the candles out first, !
Solid work! They're all out! Good job!OK, then. Now it's time for your present, !
We all picked this out together! We hope you like it, .
Happy birthday, !
Oh I have one more present for you! I'll go get it, so wait right there!

Huh? Are your pockets full? You can't carry this? WellYou know what the only thing is that's worse than losing? Not being able to hold your trophy!Oh well, I'll just send this present to you later, !Oh, hey, I just remembered There's one more thing we wanna give you. Hold on a sec!
Check it out, ! That piñata hanging up there—we made it! For you! TO DESTROY!

Pretty cool piñata, huh?<10_4 /> I thought it should have fireworks blasting out of itBut everyone else kept saying things like "that's a fire hazard," and "please, not like last time"Anyway! Still super cool. AND there's a present in there! So take this stick and bash it open!
Let me know when you're ready to obliterate that piñata!

If you watch the films and study key piñata players, you'll learn their tacticsIt won't break from just a couple whacks! Ya really gotta wail on 'em! <10_5 />BAM! <10_5 />BAM! <10_5 />BAM! <10_5 />BAM!You gotta go at that thing like it's the grand finals of a home run derby!OK, lecture's over. It's time to take a swing at it! First, come stand under the piñata.
When I say "start!" press  as fast as you can! Just like we talked about!OK, then. You good? ReaaddySteaddyHeeere weee goThiiis isss iiiit<10_10 /><10_5 />START!<10_9 />
You did it! It broke!And what prize has Lady Victory awarded you, piñata slayer?Wow! Birthday cupcakes!
You broke it already? Nice job, !And what prize has Lady Victory awarded you, piñata slayer?Wow! Birthday cupcakes!
What?! You already know what's inside?!You're funny I've never seen anybody break a piñata that fast!Whoa! Lady Victory rewarded you with birthday cupcakes!
Which means you should take these birthday cupcakes!

Heh, I got too pumped up about the whole "shoving prizes in the piñata" thing and made too many cupcakes!It's way more than one person can eat, so I say share 'em! Give us all a taste of cupcake VICTORY!OK! Good work out there today. That piñata never stood a chance! Oh, and happy birthday, !
Whoa! I forgot you didn't have room to carry anything! Gotta get my head in the game!I'll send these birthday cupcakes to you later, OK?
What! We filled your last pocket?!Well then, I'll just have to send these birthday cupcakes to your place later!
Whaddaya think? Did you like our surprise? Everyone worked super hard putting it together!Alright! Good hustle, everyone! Let's cool off with some free time!
You're leaving already?Everybody had a blast celebrating your birthday today! Let's do it again next year, !
Whoa, hold on a sec! We set all this up so you could annihilate a piñata. You aren't leaving till it's in pieces!
Where do you think you're going, ? You still have a piñata to atomize, .
Whoa, ! You're not just gonna leave your piñata un-disintegrated, are you?
Hey, if you don't blow the candles out with , your cake's gonna melt, .
Press  to blow out all the candles! C'mon, ! You can do it, !
Now's the time to show off that world-famous lung capacity!

So?! Was your surprise birthday partya surprise, ?Everybody skipped out on sleep, and even morning calisthenics, to prep for your party! Everybody likes you a lot and wanted to give you a great day! They're still buzzing about it!
I saw your biceps when you were smashing that piñata! Wow! Serious muscle tone!You been working out, ? Of course you have! Just look at you!
I'm gonna see to it that you make some considerable progress in the coming year!First, I'll come up with the perfect strength training routine for you! Look forward to it, .
If you eat all those birthday cupcakes yourself, you'll feel REALLY gross.Pass 'em around, ! Give everyone a taste of cupcake hype!
I'm glad to have a rival like you!Because you're my rival, if today's your birthday, then it's a special day for me too Rivalry Day!
